If you wanna know how good this game is, I'll tell. This man played 2 hours of a russian version of this game when he was 6 years old, did not understand anything (neither in russian or english). The experience stuck with  him for 9 years. Then, as a teen he decided to play this game again and got the experience of his life, and much more. In summary, if you want a good game this is A good game (expect a few anoying glitches in the later half, like the gonarch fight but there's a high chance you won't experience them)

A game this old has no rights being this good. The graphics are lacking, but really this game made me realize that graphics are meaningless in comparison to gameplay and storytelling. This game does the other two perfectly. It's not perfect. You will get lost. Some parts are confusing. It's still an incredibly enjoyable experience.
Pretty good game even with the age it has. Some parts can get a bit hard from time to time either if it is combat or puzzles but still good either way, really enjoyed the story.
This game taught me how to properly use a crowbar.
Gordon got here to put a crystal in a laser, then he goes home

Hace muchos aÃ±os sabia de la existencia de este juego, ahora que lo tengo. Entiendo lo maravillados y el significado que fue este juego para la historia. Simplemente maravilloso, lo jugarÃ­a una y otra vez.

Waste of time.

I don't get why this game have all this 'cult'. Plot is mediocre, moving is rather clumsy, fights get frustrating from time to time.

If you, like me, think 'I should play it, it is part of Games history, part of legacy...' then just watch first and last cutscene. Seriously, in the mean time there is just plain shooter (boring for modern players).

Well, maybe this game should be in hearts of all players, but definitely not on my SSD.

Half life 1

Pros
Great story (+2)
Great combat (+2)
World and Atmosphere interactivity (+2)
Great Soundtrack (+2)

Cons
off level design (-0.5)
Dated graphics (-0.5)

Score 9/10

Summary
As of by this review I have completed Half life for the very first time and all I have to say is ,this game is really revolutionary during 1998 it has done a lot of things that most fps games at that time didn't,it did something unique during the 1990's by making the protagonist not feel as if it were a bad ass already but a bad ass in the end of their journey.The interactivity in this world is phenomenal,allowing you to interact with NPCS,buttons,levers,turrets and etc.,well for NPCS,they do not do so much but following you for requesting them for specific tasks that Gordon Freeman can't do,it makes Gordon more like if he's part of the world,but not him as the world.During the Gameplay you can experience that not all NPCS are against you,HECU's for example are hostile against Gordon Freeman,black mesa personnel,and various aliens,this gives them much more room for creativity when it comes to level design.The atmosphere in this game at the time of it's release was unique and revolutionary it made you feel so small,and making some structures if it were part of the facility making fallen or destroyed debris a path because of the resonance cascade,however this game is a masterpiece in game design,but there are some flaws,the graphics of the gold source engine are really dated,that's why turning on HD content is really recommended even if it doesn't follow it's proper view,now I don't focus mainly on graphics unless if it disrupts the gameplay,so that's why I'm giving it a low deduction,now however when you reach Xen in the later part of the game the level design and platforming is a bit uncomfortable,being that there is zero gravity that means you really can't maneuver that much in the air,that's why when there are these jump pads in Xen you better angle yourself on which platform you want to land on,and sometimes when it comes to moving platforms in Xen yeah it can get a bit tricky at times,half life at the time of this game I really lowered my expectations about the soundtrack,but boy was I wrong,there were some amazing music whether it would be atmospheric such as "Vague Voices",and "Space Ocean",to the loud,impactful and adrenaline filled music such as "Nuclear Space Jam","Adrenaline Horror",and "Diabolical Adrenaline Guitar" to even the fun and enjoyful kind of music such as "Klaxon Beat",and "Credits Closing Theme".This game all in all is a massive achievement in gaming,it's a masterpiece from it's story telling and it's atmosphere,so would I recommend you this game?

For the sake of nostalgia trip go ahead and buy this game

If you think that these issues will hinder your Gameplay a bit then I recommend a more faithful and much better remake then I highly recommend purchasing Black Mesa 

Score 9/10
